search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for KanbanFlow (kanbanflow.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for KanbanFlow is available at: [https://kanbanflow.com/pricing](https://kanbanflow.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

Pricing
KanbanFlow offers a powerful free version. Whenever you feel like you need more, our Premium version is ready to take your productivity to the next level.
Free
$0
No time limitSign up now
Premium
$5
per user per month10% discount when paying per yearStart free 14-day trialKanban boardUnlimited boardsUnlimited tasksWIP limitsSubtasksFilterRecurring tasksSwimlanesFile attachmentsCustom fieldsCustom colorsSearchCopy boardTask numberingAutomatic task sortingRelationsWatch columnsMass updateTime managementStopwatch timerPomodoro timerPomodoro statisticsTime spent reportAnalytics & reportingPrint viewExcel & CSV exportCumulative flowCycle & Lead timeBurndownThroughputCalendarDue date performanceDashboardMonte Carlo forecastingRevision historyTime estimate reportTask count reportIntegrationsExcel & CSV importAdd tasks by emailAPI & webhooksCalendar feed / iCalZapierDropboxGoogle DriveOneDriveBoxSecurity & controlTwo-factor authenticationView-only permission roleCustom permission rolesMiscellaneousBackup siteSupport levelStandardPriority

Frequently asked questions


Is there a time limit for the free version?
No. You can use it for as long as you want.
Can I upgrade or downgrade between Free and Premium?
Yes. You can upgrade and downgrade your plan at any time.
What is your cancelation policy?
You can cancel at any time. No more charges are made after you have canceled.

We are a team that wants Premium, should everyone sign up individually?
If you are a team, only one of you should sign up for premium and then invite the others. The person signing up will pay for the entire team.
Can I enable Premium for only some of my boards?
Yes. You can select which boards that you want to enable the premium features for. The other boards can be shared with anyone without a license, just like in the free version.
Other questions? Mail to sales@kanbanflow.com
